channel.title: The road to Bukkit (official server upgrade)
channel.description:
Now that things seem to have settled out with the updates, and Bukkit is stable again, I will work on getting all the plugins and such so we can upgrade!
I'll post the status here, so you know when you can start getting the newer clients.
Big Brother - Grief protection; logs all actions on the server LWC - Chest, door, sign, furnace, and dispenser protection. WorldEdit - Needed for worldguard WorldGuard - Region protection, we use this to protect the spawn area and other parts of the server Authentication - Because this is an offline-mode server, we need a way to let people verify who is who. Group Management - Bukkit does not come with group management like I thought, we need a plugin for this.
If there are any [b]required[/b] plugins (not things like Minecart mania, we just want the essentials for now) that I forgot, post them here.
It seems we're good to go! I will be hosting a beta mode (so we dont fuck up the server ;)) on my computer for probably just today or a few hours, connect with 76.104.173.251
[u][b]Things to be tested:[/b][/u] [s]Region protection[/s] (works, we just need to test if the old DB is compatible with the new plugin) [s]Authentication[/s] [s]LWC [Door - Chest - Furnace - Sign - Dispenser][/s] [s]World Edit[/s] [s]Big Brother [Logging - Checking][/s] [s]Group Management[/s]

item.title: The road to Bukkit (official server upgrade)
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:95, topic:384033”]Us walking = something we don’t want.[/quote] gotta walk anyway, build nere spawn = greifed.

so… theres no diference with a server reset you will still have to walk for hours a way from spwan

Read full topic
item.source: The road to Bukkit (official server upgrade)

item.title: The road to Bukkit (official server upgrade)
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

After reading 2-3 pages of “reset” “no nub” well…

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:96, topic:384033”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=479792.msg3517339#msg3517339 date=1299107346]
Us walking = something we don’t want.
[/quote]

So if we reset you would build right at spawn? hehe

Ok, If you don’t want to walk I’ll tele you to the edge of the map, there, now you have no excuses left.[/quote]

When you put it like that, mitb, I have to say you trumped with that one.

[quote=“Davidi2, post:97, topic:384033”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=479792.msg3517342#msg3517342 date=1299107479]

Us walking = something we don’t want.

So if we reset you would build right at spawn? hehe

Ok, If you don’t want to walk I’ll tele you to the edge of the map, there, now you have no excuses left.
[/quote]And we have the home commands; so you can set your ‘spawn’ point someplace else.

Here’s an idea:
I teleport far-far-far-far-far away, create a warp point called ‘spawn2’ or something. People can build around there if they want to start over, and then if they die and get taken to spawn, they can teleport to that warp. This also allows them to have a home warp besides spawn.

Though to be honest I don’t see why we cant just have 2 worlds :|[/quote]

Or also this, because there might be some things I want to keep from my old house.

Read full topic
item.source: The road to Bukkit (official server upgrade)

inb4new map, current one is kinda messed up

  • vanilla server sounds good, all these plugins don’t make it feel like minecraft anymore incl. spawn… It feels ‘fake’

go away no1 likes asshole dutch who cant learn that this is an english server
[/quote]
I can smell the butthurt and racism[/quote]

im not racist i just find it annoying when hes been told millions of time he only allowed to speak english and when we try to tell him again he says fuck you ect

Read full topic

item.title: The road to Bukkit (official server upgrade)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:102, topic:384033”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=479792.msg3517378#msg3517378 date=1299109211]

[quote author=LilXCj link=topic=479792.msg3517356#msg3517356 date=1299108209]
How about…

New spawn point.

Fixt
[/quote]How about… no.

And we have the home commands; so you can set your ‘spawn’ point someplace else.

Here’s an idea:
I teleport far-far-far-far-far away, create a warp point called ‘spawn2’ or something. People can build around there if they want to start over, and then if they die and get taken to spawn, they can teleport to that warp. This also allows them to have a home warp besides spawn.

Though to be honest I don’t see why we cant just have 2 worlds

As I said on page 4, I think a new world would be fine.
[/quote]It sounds good to me, but I think we’d need another plugin to allow people to go back and forth,

David[size=10pt]i[/size]'s suggestion accomplishes everything you guys wanted, and we can keep our single world map, whats the problem with it?[/quote]Set it up

Read full topic
item.source: The road to Bukkit (official server upgrade)

item.title: The road to Bukkit (official server upgrade)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:99, topic:384033”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=479792.msg3517356#msg3517356 date=1299108209]
How about…

New spawn point.

Fixt
[/quote]How about… no.

[quote author=StrikeMC link=topic=479792.msg3517372#msg3517372 date=1299108892]

And we have the home commands; so you can set your ‘spawn’ point someplace else.

Here’s an idea:
I teleport far-far-far-far-far away, create a warp point called ‘spawn2’ or something. People can build around there if they want to start over, and then if they die and get taken to spawn, they can teleport to that warp. This also allows them to have a home warp besides spawn.

Though to be honest I don’t see why we cant just have 2 worlds

As I said on page 4, I think a new world would be fine.
[/quote]It sounds good to me, but I think we’d need another plugin to allow people to go back and forth,[/quote]

Then we would also need multiple world maps generated? And then how often would we create new maps? Whenever anyone wanted one. I don’t want to host a server with 100 maps.

Davidi’s suggestion accomplishes everything you guys wanted, and we can keep our single world map, whats the problem with it? (probably a nether map too, but thats it)

Read full topic

item.title: The road to Bukkit (official server upgrade)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The point is, if we reset the server it forces the people who don’t want a reset to lose things, and do something they don’t want. If we don’t reset, it forces the people who do want a reset into nothing, they can just start over by going someplace else.

Read full topic
